title: The Ultimate Gaming App
body: A webb app that will give users 10 new gaming questions each day and track their progress in things like game design, game theory, and more!

title: The Best Pokemon Guide App
body: A web app that will give users the best tips and tricks for Pokemon Go, including how to catch the rarest Pokemon, how to level up quickly, and more!

title: Rock Paper, Scissors
body: A game for Windows and macOS where players can play rock paper scissors against the computer. The computer will keep track of the player's wins and losses and display them on the screen.
